Control.Title: Slider
Control.Description: The horizontal slider enables you to select a date or a numeric value.

Sample.Title: Default
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the default slider.

Sample.Title: Dividers, labels, and ticks
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the divider, ticks and labels features.

Sample.Title: Date interval
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the interval feature.

Sample.Title: Step
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the step size feature.

Sample.Title: Thumb icon
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the thumb icon customization.

Sample.Title: Color
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the color customizations.

Sample.Title: Size
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the size customizations.

Sample.Title: Label
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the label customization. The SfSlider doesn't have in-built support for category axis. In this sample, label text was customized using the LabelCreated event.

Control.Title: Range Slider
Control.Description: The horizontal range slider enables you to select a date or a numeric range.

Sample.Description: This sample showcases the default range slider.

Sample.Description: This sample showcases the range slider ticks, divider and labels features.

Sample.Title: Step
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the step size feature.

Sample.Title: Interval selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the interval selection feature.

Sample.Description: This sample showcases the drag mode feature.

Sample.Title: Color
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the color customization.

Sample.Title: Size
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the size customization.

Control.Title: Range Selector
Control.Description: Visualize data and select a date or numeric range.

Sample.Title: Default
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the default range selector.

Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the chart selection using the range selector.

Sample.Title: Zooming
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the range selector with zooming.
